1.content:
You may have a few different cursed people get together such as a were-horse with a were-bird. Sex is allowed but respecting the 18+ rating, make sure there is some actual story and not just sex.

These are the characters you begin with:

Ryan Saunders: a were-horse

Owen Richardson: a were-cow

Rose Pierce: a were-rodent

Laura Grant: a were-bird

Theo Hart: a were-fish

Blake Hooper: a were-shrinker

Brooke Wright: a were-giantess (no taller than 72 feet)

Lilliana "Lily" Brooks: a were-shrinker

Sam Cooper: a were-giant (no taller than 72 feet)

Kyle Olson: a were-deformed (his body parts shrink or grow)

Bryan Coffey: a were-ghost

Dana Blanchard: a were-blob

Adam Davies: (I don't know yet. Make a suggestion.)

Phoebe Schmidt: (I don't know yet. Make a suggestion.)

Jason Cannon: (I don't know yet. Make a suggestion.)

Dominic Young: a were-statue

Shane Booth: a were-tool

Josh Thomas: a were-clothing item

Connor Nichols: a were-vehicle

Cody Stewart: a were-cock

You may add characters.

No one knows how it began. Scientists are baffled. Not only are were-creatures impossible but there isn't any consistent pattern. About one percent of the population became were-creatures and these people have nothing in common. It doesn't act like a virus. It's not contagious. It cannot be picked up from the environment.

Which main character do you want to start with?

13.title: One of the weird shifters

choices: He figures out how to turn invisible
He sinks into the floor to hide

131.content:
The were-curses didn't strike all at once. The first case was five months ago. Bryan hoped he wouldn't get a were-curse.

He was on the debate team at a tournament. It was his turn to debate. He stepped up to the podium when all his clothes fell off. He looked down to see that he was floating above the floor and see-through but not invisible. He hid behind the podium but there were people around him that could still see his ghostly backside.





NOTE: Option three means that other people can touch Bryan such as grabbing him or pushing him but Bryan cannot touch people. So someone can grab Bryan but Bryan cannot push that person away or resist in any manner. Anyone can push Bryan around but Bryan cannot resist and cannot push back.
131.title: Bryan Coffey: a were-ghost

choices: Be safely and humanely secured on campus (by tying up a rope around his organ)
Stay chained in the detention room.
Be sent home and he'll hear his punishment tomorrow.
1313.content:
It was deeply ironic that the current topic of debate was about the dress code of campus, because Bryan Coffey had just lost all of his clothes and something else.

That something else was his opacity. Bryan’s body was a transparent and translucent white light denied from laws of physics. It had been a sudden and completely unexpected process that should have left most of the public in utmost awe.

But their reaction was completely the opposite. They laughed and mocked the white ghost partially because of Bryan’s known attitude towards Were-Somethings, but mostly because the ghost currently hiding behind the podium had retained Bryan Coffey’s human body in all his naked splendor.

Bryan’s exposed ghostly skin was porcelain white all over, even his nipples and the tip of his currently shrinking penis now looked slightly grayscale as if the naked young man was posing in a grayscale photograph. The cowardly ghost shaking in fear behind the podium also discovered that all his body hair had fallen out among his clothes, making him feel more exposed than ever.
“Oh, heavens! A student is completely nude on stage! We banned those kind of modern performances a long time ago!” Complained a teacher among the public. A public who mostly consisted of young and bored classmates yearning to laugh at his peer’s exposed and completely hair-free buttocks.

“I told you Bryan was a Were, he always seemed to have issues with them.” A gossiping girl whispered to her nearby classmates. “He must have been hiding it all along.”

“Hiding it?!” Joined up a male student who had overheard the conversation. “I swear he was just waiting for the best moment to *BARE* it all to us! He must be jerking off behind the podium right now!”

Bryan had heard enough. He hadn’t been hiding anything about being a Were-Something, what’s more, he didn’t learn of that fact until two minutes ago! And he definitely wasn’t some perverted exhibitionist who got off on showing himself indecently!

Still shivering, the ghost’s nervous face leaned off from hiding. He had to clear things up!

Alas, when Bryan opened his ghostly mouth, no audible sounds came.

“He’s sticking his tongue out at us! The bastard!” Said an accusing student misunderstanding Bryan’s attempts at speech.

The ghost went back into hiding. How the hell had he managed to turn everything for the worse?!

The whole situation was getting out of hand. Everything culminated with one of the teachers ordering everyone to get hold of that ghost “before he causes anymore trouble!”

Had Bryan heard that correctly? Why was he being treated like a delinquent?

The were-ghost noticed a security guard approaching him from behind. Where could he escape to...?

...Wait, he was a floating ghost. He could just fly away!

“Get over here you nudist vandal!” Cried out the guard.

It was now or never. Bryan impulsed himself upward, which to his surprise worked amazingly well.

Until he felt a painful tug on his penis.

“Gotcha! You’re not going anywhere Mr. Ghostly Exhibitionist!”

It had been like a slapstick cartoon. After the guard had yanked Bryan’s penis the ghostly organ stretched to comedic proportions until the inevitable happened and Bryan flew down with a slingshot effect.

The ghost was now hanging upside-down. He looked up, and saw the guard’s fist unceremoniously clenched against his vulnerable sexual organ.

In his obvious panic Bryan tried with all his might to liberate himself from the humiliating grasp, but whenever he touched the guard’s body his ghostly hands just when through and popped out from the other side.

Bryan’s ghostly form was incorporeal, but living beings were able to touch him. The ghost had no way to know why this happened, but ghosts and spirits have always been a step lower in the life ladder compared to organic beings, so it was just only natural that organic beings were able to manipulate him but not vice versa. It’s just pure logic.

Bryan’s face was pale as a ghost, as if it could be any other way. He struggled and screamed but no sound came out from his ethereal body.

“Er...Looks like the show’s cancelled kids.” Said the chairman taking Bryce’s place in the podium. “Don’t worry, we got the were-ghost under control. We’ll have a meeting tomorrow to decide the best course of action regarding his punishment but for the rest the day, the were-ghost will...”
1313.title: You can touch me but I can't touch you

145.content:
Cody was in the shower after P.E. when he transformed again into a cock. He groaned. He had been randomly transforming for a month now but he still wasn't used to it.

He didn't transform into a typical cock. Each time was different but he could still move. He looked like a cock and in certain ways functioned like a cock but his slit also had the ability to talk or eat like a mouth, his balls had muscles that allowed them to walk like legs, and he still had eyes and ears but no arms.

He tried to finish showering but Steve grabbed him and yelled, "Hey, Cody turned into a cock again." Steve and his friends tossed Cody around like they were playing keepaway except Cody was the thing being tossed around.

They only tossed Cody a couple of times and then Steve noticed the hole. "I always wanted a large cock." Steve stuck his own cock inside Cody's hole and Cody attached becoming Steve's cock.

Cody's transformations were different each time but typically he became larger than the average cock. This time, he was eighteen inches long so as he hung between Steve's legs, his head was just below Steve's knees.

Steve decided to helicopter his new cock so he swung Cody around in circles making Cody dizzy.

Just then, Coach Johnson stormed in. "What's going on? Steve, is that Cody between your legs?"

Steve looked at the floor and said, "Yes, sir."
145.title: Cody Stewart: a were-cock

choices: Cody has to stay in the underwear
Cody still has to do schoolwork as a penis
Steve has to let Cody eat lunch as a penis
1452.content:
Coach yelled, "My office, Now."

In the office, Coach first yelled at Steve and gave him three days detention. "This is a serious enough crime that you could go to prison if you were an adult. As it is now, these were-curses are too new for the laws to figure out how to handle them but Cody is a person, not a cock."

Steve said, "But I know of a guy that turns into a horse and while he's a horse, he let's people saddle him and ride him as if he was a horse, not a person."

Coach yelled, "That guy has to make a living somehow. For people who randomly become inhuman, it's hard to get and keep a job. But that man is allowing himself to be ridden. It's his choice. You didn't give Cody a choice, did you?"

Cody yelled, "No, he didn't."

Coach yelled, "Unfortunately for Cody, he cannot become human again until he's had an orgasm and that would mean giving you an orgasm, Steve and we can't allow that in school. If Cody wasn't attached to you, we'd send him home to take care of himself but I don't want to reward you, Steve with a day off from school. So Cody, you're going to have to remain a cock today."
1452.title: Coach Johnson can't help Cody

info.brief_description: Some people are cursed to have an alternate form they have to take from time to time.
info.description:
Several people are cursed to transform. Each person only transforms into one other form but each person's form is different. (No werewolves as primary characters but only because they've been done too much.) Some are were-horses. Some are were-ghosts. Some are were-cars.

These people have no control over their transformations. The transformations could be controlled by someone else or by the hearing of a certain word or by the flipping of a coin. You can decide what controls the transformation as long as the cursed characters cannot control or predict their transformations.

These transformations can vary within each kind. The were-horse could become a full horse, a centaur, or an anthro but he will always be equine. These are not shape-shifters. They are cursed.

The first three chapters will be choice chapters but then stories will begin.
